name: Oculasignia
description: The all-seeing eye of the void. Nothing escapes its gaze, and no secret remains hidden.

name: Rudis
description: The brutal gladiator champion. Countless warriors have fallen to his blade.

name: Merzehal
description: The Ancient Dragon who has lived for millennia. His wisdom is matched only by his devastating power.

name: Neo Maton Sword
description: A mechanical warrior from a lost civilization. Its blade can cut through dimensions.

name: Black Shadow
description: The embodiment of darkness itself. It exists in the space between light and void.

name: Reliza
description: The frost maiden who brings eternal winter. Her heart is colder than the ice she commands.

name: Ferzen
description: The Ice Lord whose frozen domain knows no mercy. His cold heart matches his frozen powers.

name: Filrocas
description: The plague doctor who spreads pestilence. His touch brings disease and despair.

name: Kuzto
description: The keeper of the labyrinth. He traps wanderers in endless mazes of despair.

name: Gravicep
description: A monstrous entity with gravity-defying strength. Its crushing blows can flatten mountains.
